FTE (Fine Tooned Engineering) Sweet-16  

 

  

 

 

 

The Sweet-16 is a 16-bit 65816 CPU replacement Upgrade for the Atari 400/800 and XL/XE computers. Designed by Mike Holman of FTE, Sweet-16 was one of many promised upgrades.  He obtained limited rights to certain ICD assets and supposedly some OSS assets, but unfortunately many issues arose from him taking money and borrowed equipment and never delivering on much of the products promised. Then he completely disappeared from the Atari scene. This is a shame, because if he had delivered on much of what was announced, he would've offered many sorely needed things in the 8bit Atari world.

Anyone with a manual or other information or items from FTE, please contact the Atari Museum by clicking HERE
